item.title: flock
item.description: TIL about the flock system call which applies or removes an advisory lock on an open file. The thing to pay attention is the word advisory, other processes can ignore this lock if they wish to do so. This syscall will lock the entire file, which can be pretty bad for highly concurrent systems. For more information: man 2 flock For a more fine grained locking mechanism: man 2 fcntl
